content: slipstream sock row 2 *k4 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k7 p1 k1 p1 yarn hearth rest alder fingering in oregon k3* repeat until end of row iris gusto wool carmen in #1412 row 3-32 repeat row 1-2 16 more times gauge 36 stitches = 4 on last row/row 32 leave the last knit stitch needle us 1 2 25mm 9 circular 40 for the beginning of your shadow wrap heel circular for magic loop/ two at a time or preferred method for socks heel sizes measure the ball of your foot just below you can substitute your favorite heel pattern the start of your toes however my favorite is the shadow wrap heel small 7 /17 78cm medium 8 /20 32cm earthtones girl has a good but lengthy large 9 /22 86cm extra large 10 /25 4cm tutorial https //tinyurl com/ shadowwrapheel cast on 56 64 72 80 stitches using the german twisted cast on also known as the create your double stitches as per old norwegian cast on place a bor the video beginning at 9 00 until beginning of round marker and optional a you have 9 10 12 13 double stitches on either halfway marker at 28 32 36 40 stitches end and 10 12 12 14 regular knit stitches in the middle of your heel you should finish on a row 1-16 *k1 p1* repeat until end of row wrong side/purl row continuing with the video at around 18 35 we leg will create triple stitches from our double small stitches to finish the heel pocket you will have row 1 *k2 p1 k1 p1 k4 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 one triple stitch remaining on your needles k2* repeat until end of row which will be resolved on the next round row 2 *k2 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k4 p1 k1 p1 k2* repeat until end of row medium foot row 1 *k3 p1 k1 p1 k5 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 small k2* repeat until end of row row 1 *k2 p1 k1 p1 k4 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 row 2 *k3 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k5 p1 k1 p1 k2* repeat until halfway marker or last 28 k2* repeat until end of row stitches k to end of row row 2 *k2 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k4 p1 k1 p1 large k2* repeat until halfway marker or last 28 row 1 *k3 p1 k1 p1 k6 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 stitches k to end of row k3* repeat until end of row medium row 1 *k3 p1 k1 p1 k5 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 row 2 *k3 p1 slip 1 wyib p1 k6 p1 k1 p1 k2* repeat until halfway marker or last 32 k3* repeat until end of row stitches k
